thread.title: Justin Bieber Stars in Delightfully Weird Japanese Ad Following Super Bowl Spot -- Go Behind the Scenes!
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber Stars in Delightfully Weird Japanese Ad Following Super Bowl Spot -- Go Behind the Scenes!

author: Alex Ungerman
title: Justin Bieber Stars in Delightfully Weird Japanese Ad Following Super Bowl Spot -- Go Behind the Scenes!
text: Justin Bieber Stars in Delightfully Weird Japanese Ad Following Super Bowl Spot -- Go Behind the Scenes! by Alex Ungerman 5:19   Playing Justin Bieber Stars in Delightfully Weird Japanese Ad Following Super Bowl Spot -- Go Behind the Scenes! Justin Bieber is keeping up on his ad game! The Purpose singer followed up his Super Bowl ad spot for T-Mobile with a Japanese ad for Softbank, based on the viral Pikotaro song, "PPAP (Pinapple Pen Apple Pen)." Check out a behind-the-scenes look at the commercial shoot in the clip below. Thank you, Piko! I think I finally got everything that had to do with the pen-pineapple-apple-pen thing! pic.twitter.com/zGId54wL4T
